categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A male ensign served in the Galactic Empire's navy aboard the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Herald. In 3 ABY, he greeted Captain Tabor Seitaron, who was called aboard the Herald by the Star Destroyer's owner Prelate Verge, and gave the captain a tour around the destroyer.
The Imperial ensign appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
